description:
Ultimate Fighters need ultimate weapons! The Ultimate Weapon Pack includes 3x weapons for each character!

The Ultimate Weapon Pack includes:
・Neptune's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Noire's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Blanc's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Vert's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Nepgear's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Uni's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Rom's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Ram's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Uzume's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Older Neptune's Ultimate Weapon Set
・IF's Ultimate Weapon Set
・Compa's Ultimate Weapon Set
・B-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
・S-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
・C-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
・K-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
name: Ultimate Weapon Pack
